question: ‘Pragati’ is a Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiative of which technological company in India?
explanation:
Major Technological Company Facebook launched its Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiative called ‘Pragati’ in India.
The initiative which aims to boost women entrepreneurship in India, is powered by N/Core (The/Nudge Centre for Social Innovation). The project will incubate and accelerate early-stage women-led non-profit units that work on women entrepreneurship. The initiative will award four financial grants of up to ₹50 lakh for each non-profit organisation.
